items.sentence: Could you please tell Tom that I need his help?
Do you always drink coffee with your breakfast?
Do you think that you would enjoy being famous?
No matter what happens, don\'t forget to smile.
It\'s the most beautiful thing I\'ve ever seen.
Thank you very much for your generous donation.
I need to find someone to back up Tom\'s alibi.
Without Tom, Mary would have no one to turn to.
Do you think I\'m too old to go back to school?
Do you think we\'ll have good weather tomorrow?
Don\'t put the wallet on the top of the heater.
Tom was invited to the ribbon-cutting ceremony.
Tom was probably drunk when he crashed his car.
Tom was really glad to see that Mary was happy.
Can you take care of the children for a moment?
Can you tell me when to switch the machine off?
Can you tell me where the nearest pay phone is?
Tom is the son of a famous professor in Boston.
Tom is thinking of going to Boston next winter.
Tom is too young to go out by himself at night.
Tom couldn\'t convince Mary that she was wrong.
My feet went to sleep and I couldn\'t stand up.
My sister isn\'t a good cook, and neither am I.
My vet won\'t feed his dog commercial dog food.
If you don\'t want to talk, you don\'t have to.
Tom and Mary looked at each other for a moment.
Tom and Mary looked at each other speechlessly.
Tom and Mary looked at each other with concern.
Tom and Mary made handprints in the wet cement.
Tom and Mary picked some berries in the forest.
We have to do something about what\'s going on.
We have to find out what we\'re supposed to do.
Tom had a feeling that the plan wouldn\'t work.
Do you think you\'re smarter than your parents?
Are you positive you saw me turn off the stove?
Are you positive you saw me turn the stove off?
Did Tom ever tell you what he wanted you to do?
Did Tom really walk home from school with Mary?
Tom is used to getting up early in the morning.
Have you ever had a long distance relationship?
Have you ever heard Tom and Mary sing together?
Have you ever heard someone speaking in French?
Have you ever taken your children to the beach?
Tom doesn\'t know anything about this, does he?
Tom doesn\'t like the way Mary makes spaghetti.
Tom doesn\'t remember anything from that night.
You don\'t look like you\'re having a good day.
I didn\'t know that wasn\'t supposed to happen.
I didn\'t know we weren\'t supposed to do that.
I don\'t know if that\'s what Tom wants or not.
